Question & Options:
Which statements accurately describe the actions of M. Bison in relation to Shadaloo?
Options:
A. a) M. Bison executed shareholders of Shadaloo in front of Chun-Li.
B. b) M. Bison is publicly operating Shadaloo and coercing property owners.
C. c) Shadaloo is a legitimate business under M. Bison's control.
D. d) M. Bison announced his complete control over Shadaloo.
Correct Answer: a) M. Bison executed shareholders of Shadaloo in front of Chun-Li. and b) M. Bison is publicly operating Shadaloo and coercing property owners. and d) M. Bison announced his complete control over Shadaloo.
